body.name: Danni's Diaper Extenders - Includes 4 Reusable and Absorbent Diaper Extender Pads - Attaches to ANY diaper! - Prevents Diaper Blowouts - Comfortable and Effective. (Reusable!) Diapering Peace of Mind!
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 14 hrs 28 mins
features: Save your baby's clothes from stains.
Attaches to the back panel of ANY disposable or reusable diaper. As shown.
Can be used on the front of a diaper as well to prevent urine messes.
body.description: Danni's Diaper Extenders Patent Pending Diaper Extenders are machine washable, cloth, handmade diaper extender pads that absorb far past a diaper's capabilities. AND REUSABLE an infinite number of times! ONE SIZE FITS ALL! Buy once USE FOREVER. (Great baby shower gift) Woven, Handmade, Absorbent Pads with a velcro-like strip that allows it to stick to ANY diaper and be reused over and over again. Made with clean absorbent, hypoallergenic materials. Never fear a diaper blowout again! Includes 4 Diaper Extender Pads, and a canvas carry bag. Helpful for Hydronephrosis, pyelostomy, pyelostomies, vesicostomy, and posterior urethral valve needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No more messes!
reviews.reviewText: This product has helped us avoid blowout messes! Highly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Contains the mess
reviews.reviewText: I had tried 4 different diaper brands but none of them worked…leaks with every dirty diaper. This is my 3rd kid & I’ve never had to change the bedding or put down a soaker cloth wherever the baby was laid. After 5 months of leaks I finally found these diaper extenders. Genius! They are soft, absorbant and best of all, they work! I have used them now for a week and they launder & dry well, retaining the shape and integrity of the item. Great customer service too! (One had a flaw and I messaged the seller. She replaced it immediately with no questions asked.) I’m so glad some mama thought of this and took time to create it. It has changed my life! No more scared blow out moments. Just sweet diaper changes where I can tickle my baby. Not to mention, I’m not spending time washing out all of her clothes while my other two kids are wreaking havoc. Seriously, worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great idea and useful
reviews.reviewText: This has been pretty useful for preventing my baby’s poos from getting on his clothes, although it would be better if it’s a bigger piece so it can cover more area. Also it would get wrinkled up after being washed and dried in the machines, even at low temperatures unfortunately.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Everyday blowouts are a thing of the past with these. Purchased more!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 20, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Worked but tricky
reviews.reviewText: These technically did their job and absorbed blowouts from my infant. However they are a little too thick/bulky and there’s still a gap between the pad and baby’s back. They don’t dry flat so become hard to use and apply to the diaper after several uses. I tried flattening them back out w a heavy book post washing. They were also a bit overpriced given there were only 4 or 5 to a pack and we go thru 10 + diapers in a 24 hour period.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: These have prevented so many blowouts! Not a single one has made its way past these. Seriously such a lifesaver.You can machine wash and dry them, but put them in a laundry bag or the velcro will stick to whatever it can.The only negative is that they are a little hot for summer, but not enough to not use them.If you're considering them, do it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Helpful but sticks to other laundry
reviews.reviewText: At first, I really liked these. I used 3 of the 4 in the first day and appreciated that his clothes and the blankets were spared. However, instead of washing other items, I still had to wash these, so it didn't really save any/much laundry. Also, there were quite a few times that poop got on the extender but just barely, so I had to wash it but if it hadn't have been there, no poop would have come out the diaper anyway. So it created extra work when there wouldn't have been a problem in the first place.My major issue, though, is I couldn't figure out how to wash these without them sticking and rippng up other laundry. I tried a zippered laundry bag but it stuck and ripped at the fabric. I tried sticking it to a towel but it came free when wet. Just having it in a load of laundry meant it got lost and stuck to our clothes, which then seemed like they could get damaged by the velcro. I found these helpful for a bit but ultimately more of a hassle for me than not.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Helped save a new mom from a big mess
reviews.reviewText: Used this while out with my 7 week old. He had a blow out that was contained thankfully from using these diaper extenders. The prevented a huge mess in his car seat I was so thankful I thought ahead and used one. Recommend to anyone who has a baby and wants to be resourceful since these are reusable.
